html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-09082023-09-25FIN
ActBudget Implementation Act, 2021, No.1
SubjectOrder Fixing July 1, 2024 as the Day on Which Section 159 of the Budget Implementation Act, 2021, No. 1 Comes into Force
PrecisOrder fixing July 1, 2024 as the day on which section 159 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2021, No. 1 COME INTO FORCE in order to (1) ensure that those who transport currency or money orders, traveller’s cheques or other similar negotiable instruments become reporting entities under the Act; and (2) determine the underlying client, parties to a transaction, and origin of funds to mitigate money laundering and terrorist financing risks identified with funds handled by armoured car companies.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Fixing July 1, 2024 as the Day on Which Section 159 of the Budget Implementation Act, 2021, No. 1 Comes into Force
precis: Order fixing July 1, 2024 as the day on which section 159 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2021, No. 1 COME INTO FORCE in order to (1) ensure that those who transport currency or money orders, traveller’s cheques or other similar negotiable instruments become reporting entities under the Act; and (2) determine the underlying client, parties to a transaction, and origin of funds to mitigate money laundering and terrorist financing risks identified with funds handled by armoured car companies.
